text:
Hi everyone,
I’m Laurent, from Paris, France. I am starting as CMO in a fantastic hr/fintech startup called <http://Worklife.io|Worklife.io>, on a journey to bring employee benefits to the modern digital era & make HR matter again. That’d make us sort of a European equivalent of <http://level.com|level.com> . Previously I was deputy-CMO at the world’s largest news agency, <http://afp.com|afp.com> (former teammates on the ground in Ukraine :pray::muscle:).
At Worklife I’m responsible for brand, com&pr and acquisition. We’re on a hyper-growth mode, need to go from start-to-scaleup in the next 12months. So I’m here to learn as much and as fast as I can from yall, and humbly contribute whenever I can.
Happy to connect via DM’s as well!
Have a great day !
greetings from Paris :fr::cheese_wedge::wine_glass::soccer:️

text:
Howdies, I'm Esther, a former arts professor turned content creator and sailor. My husband and I just wrapped 4 yrs of living on our 35' sailboat and learning how to sail, poking around anchorages around Florida along the way. :boat:️

I've been working remotely for 5+ years and contributing to instructional design and content creation for nonprofits, B2Bs, and B2Cs, such as Sierra Club, Basecamp, and Designlab. I recently started contracting with the Georgia Center for Nonprofits (serving over 1,000+ nonprofits) and also for Nectara, devoted to fostering psychedelic Integration and preparation.

In particular, I'm hoping find connection here in this community, especially with other POCs and allies. I also welcome finding a mentor for occasional chats about navigating imposter syndrome and the ways we both can continue to expand and grow! Looking forward to meeting y'all!

text: Hello party people! I'm Bret, in charge of content strategy for an early stage fintech platform called Hopscotch. My main background is in copywriting, developing brand positioning/identity, content production, and strategy. Been in the NYC startup world for the past 8 years, always looking to learn from peers, swap stories/questions, share resources, and just connect about cool work and good ideas. Excited to be here :the_horns:

text:
Hello hello everyone - Darryl here. I started a fintech UX consultancy and we're in the early stages of our writing team. I spent the past ~15 years as an architect/engineer in financial services.

I'm a sponge when it comes to writing (but I've been doing morning pages for the past several years), looking to learn a lot here! Also very open so share my insights in my core areas (ux and engineering leadership) 

PS - I'm seeing several fintech heros here, I'm behooved to offer my support and advice if needed! :grinning:

text:
Hi friends! Jesse here. I have a long history of working in tech and telling stories (especially translating technical concepts into more common vernacular) but am new to the content marketing space.

I'm looking for opportunities to up my content game and absorb as many tips and tricks from all you amazing people.

text: Hi everyone!!! I'm a freelance content marketer and copywriter for Edtech companies. Prior to that, I was a business and marketing teacher. I'm super excited to learn from the members in this community and add value wherever I can!

text: Hi  everyone... I am a freelance content writer who loves tech and programming. I don't have as big a portfolio as many of you, but I guess that's why I am here. Looking forward to learning and growing with y'all.

text:
Hi all! I’m Tori and am currently working from home, and by home I mean the lovely city of Madrid where I temporarily reside :es:

I remotely manage a boutique gym based in NYC (& the time difference has not been kind) while also getting my own fitness product company off the ground :muscle:. While I love the fitness industry, my background is in marketing & content strategy for various entertainment companies all over the world, and I hope to reintroduce that sector into my life as well.

I would love to connect with you all on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/victoria-norman-a734a0139/|Linkedin>, so I shall include this shameless plug. I look forward to connecting with you all :relaxed:

text: Hi everyone! My name is Rachel Murphy and I'm a freelance journalist, content writer, and copywriter--yes, that's a lot of hats! I love the variety. :slightly_smiling_face: I have more than ten years of experience in magazine journalism as an editor, and still write features and beauty and wellness content for a local glossy in Kansas City. I spend more of my time covering healthcare for Verywell Health, <http://Health.com|Health.com>, and Solv Health, with some dabbling in money writing for Investopedia and wine content for Gregory and Vine. I'm actively looking for more content marketing work, so if you need brand content, I would love to chat! You can find me on Linked In at <https://www.linkedin.com/in/rachel-murphy-leimkuehler-a836085/>.

text:
Hello Team,

I'm Manoj. I'm a content writer since 2019 and have been helping businesses writing stories for their valuable customers.

Technical and health niche content writing is my main writing forte. Along with this, I have good knowledge in digital marketing and continuously improving it working as a Digital Marketing Specialist at VR Bonkers. You can visit it at <https://vrbonkers.com/>

I'm here for networking, learning new stuff and freelance writing opportunities.
Know more about me at <https://www.linkedin.com/in/manoj-satavara/>

Let's get connected and improve our knowledge. Are you with me? Reply Yes. We would create something awesome that make us feel satisfied.

attachments.fallback: VR Bonkers: Tech & Digital Marketing, CBD Guest Post | VR Bonkers
attachments.text: We are welcoming energetic writers for guest posting on tech & digital marketing topics. Be our guest today!
